channel.title: Drops on Death problem
channel.description:
Ello,
We added some recolours to our server, but.. if you die you just keep them equipped.. ;O
Example: I got my Green ChestPlate equipped, i died against another player on my server, and i just keep the chestplate equipped?!?! So i won't ever lose it.. Even some of our donator armour are causing this problem, so the donators are strong and when they die they don't lose a shit.. How 2 Fix?
Thanks in Advance.

item.title: Drops on Death problem
item.dc:creator: @langkampo langkampo
item.description:
@langkampo wrote:

Ello,

We added some recolours to our server, but… if you die you just keep them equipped… ;O

Example:
I got my Green ChestPlate equipped, i died against another player on my server, and i just keep the chestplate equipped!!! So i won’t ever lose it… Even some of our donator armour are causing this problem, so the donators are strong and when they die they don’t lose a shit… How 2 Fix?

Thanks in Advance.
